short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show browser version information in the toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the browser version in the toolbar. This is useful for people who are testing many different browser versions at once, or those who just want to notice version changes. Source: https://github.com/ericlaw1979/ShowChromeVersion
